description: 2D Platformer for the Game Boy! (Copywrite Grenhunterr 2024)

v1.description:
This is the AP edition of Severed Soul!

original game: https://grenhunterrwastaken.itch.io/severed-soul



Download the APWorld and put it in Archipelago/custom_worlds

the ROM file works with BizHawk 2.9

yeah
v1.title: Severed Soul APWorld and Bizhawk Client!!

v1.1.description:
fixed the "Progress Per Level" option.

(you can use the .wch in BizHawk to make sure everything is okay)
v1.1.title: Severed Soul AP/Client V1.1

v1.1.1.description:
added Secret Ending Checks.

reversed the "Progress Per Level" option being backwards
v1.1.1.title: Severed Soul AP/Client V1.1.1

v1.2.description:
### Severed Soul APWorld Version 1.2


**Additions**
- Added Death Trap option
- Added Pit Checks and option
- Added 3 more secrets to go find with the "Hidden Secret Stuff" option (Tetris, K. K. Slider, and the Great Sage)

**Fixes**
- Fixed a softlock when trying to get the secret ending the claw machine breaks.
- Fixed finding the glitches during the secret ending wouldn't show.
v1.2.title: Severed Soul AP/Client V1.2

v2.description:
### SSAP Client V2 and ROM V3!!!!!!

**Additions:**
* Death link is now an option. :)
* Pit traps now exist. (Toggleable)
* Made an option which turns a hit by every enemy into a check.
* Added more "hidden secret stuff"
* Made checks for completing levels
* Added an option for your client to start talking in the AP chat for you. Beware it's rudeness.
* Once you enter the Claw Machine UI, it will hint for everything that is inside of itself.

**Fixes/Rewrites:**
* Rewrote out all of the addresses after realizing making new variables switches the pre-existing addresses.
* yeah that's pretty much it
v2.title: SSAP V2!!!!!!

v2.0.1.description:
accidentally has a generating error.

whoops

(the world was generating too many items.)
v2.0.1.title: SSAP V2.0.1 Quick Hotfix

v2.5.description:
### Fixes:

- Permanently fixed the Claw Machine. It should no longer break.
- Completed the "Secret Shop." Ignore what the description says, I was too lazy to change it.
- Fixed the ROM :)
### Is there anything else?

- no
- I was fixing this for fun
v2.5.title: SSAP V2.5

v2.6r2.description:
### basically, I made this update to fix the APWorld so I could use it in a Chrism community AP.

**Fixes:**

- Fixed an access option relating to needing a progression based coin when trying to make it to the end of the game.
- Fixed an access option relating to turning on "more_coins" and randomizing the claw machine.
- Actually fixed the Claw Machine this time. Forgot to change the variable address last update. Whoops.

**Additions:**

- Added an option to see behind the scenes during generation. (It prints what items it added and regions it connected into the console)
- Added unused "Obligatory Maze (Trap)." it does nothing, you can't add it to the itempool, don't worry about it.


(I'm adding SSAP V3.5.gb with this too if you didn't download it already.)
v2.6r2.title: SSAP: The Chrism Update

v2.7.description:
### SSAP: The Client Commands Update

**Fixes**
- Fixed death link. (It has horribly broken)
- Fixed other misc bugs.

**Updates**
- Actually made the death link send the reason why you died.
- Added the commands "funny_death" and "rudeness" in place of their respective options.

**Removes**
- Removed some options that could either be removed because they were pointless or they could be implemented into the client.
